# Make Payment on the Testnet

This code funds two accounts on the tesnet, create and submit transaction to the testnet.

Run this code:

    ruby 02_payment.rb

Sample output:

    Creating random sender...
    Creating random recipient...
    Retrieving account's current sequence number...
    Constructing transaction...
    Submitting transaction to frontier...
